AnchorError.why: Program constraint violation, account validation failed, or instruction error
fix: Check the specific AnchorError variant in the error message
Verify account constraints match the program expectations
Ensure all required accounts are provided
Check account data matches expected format

TransactionError.why: Transaction was rejected by the network or program
fix: Check transaction logs for specific error code
Verify sufficient SOL for transaction fees
Ensure all accounts are writable if needed
Check program instruction data is correct

AccountValidationError.why: Account doesn't have required keys, signatures, or permissions
fix: Verify account is signer if required
Check account has correct owner program
Ensure account is writable if modifying data
Verify account has sufficient balance

InstructionError.why: Instruction data invalid, program logic error, or constraint violation
fix: Check instruction index in error message
Verify instruction data format matches program expectations
Review program logs for specific constraint failure
Ensure all instruction accounts are correct

NetworkError.what: Failed to connect to Solana network
NetworkError.why: RPC endpoint unreachable, network issue, or invalid cluster
fix: Check RPC endpoint URL is correct
Verify network connectivity
Try a different RPC endpoint
Check if using correct cluster (mainnet, devnet, testnet)
